wikipedia_page.main: Winifred Hart-Dyke (2 December 1881 – March 1976) was an English dancer and actress associated with the D'Oyly Carte Opera Company and Edwardian Musical Comedy. Her surname appears with and without the hyphen.

response: *Ladies of Crewe Boodle's Party: Lena Leibrandt, Olive Rae, G. Thornton, Miss Standen and Winifred Hart-Dyke
*Karen of the Red Shoes – Winifred Hart-Dyke
